skillTree.name: Warhorse
skillTree.description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

skillTree.name: War Bear
skillTree.description: Loyal, fierce, powerful and surprisingly fast – a War Bear is a symbol of Kislev itself.

skillTree.name: Ursun's Protection
skillTree.description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.

skillTree.name: Guardian Call
skillTree.description: Long has peace in the Old World been bought with the blood of Kislev. When Ruination descends, none are more ready to meet it than the hardy guardians of the north.

ui_effects.description: Summoned unit has increased melee attack and melee defence
Summoned unit has greatly increased melee attack and melee defence

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Eagle Eye
skillTree.description: There are any number of mysterious wonders secreted away in the shadows, for those discerning enough to find them.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Magistrate
skillTree.description: "Kislev's coffers will be overflowing! The things we could do with all that gold!"

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local province)
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%

Construction cost: -6% for all buildings
	(local province)
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Scholar
skillTree.description: There is much to be learned from one's neighbours, especially if they fail to shroud their discoveries from prying eyes.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 4%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 8%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: Champion of the Ice Guard
skillTree.description: "Show no mercy for the enemies of Kislev, for they will show no mercy to you!"

skillTree.name: Handmaiden of the Ice Queen
skillTree.description: Often the most dangerous assault comes from the enemy you least expect.

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 10% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Hawks of Miska Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Hawks of Miska Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Dynamism
skillTree.description: True understanding gives rise to a spirit of protection.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.name: Hidden Paths
skillTree.description: There is always another way.

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Quell
skillTree.description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Onslaught
skillTree.description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Potent
skillTree.description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Unit
skillTree.description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
